body.p: Professor Barth and Mr Smith disagree with the Board’s decision to make an exception to the IFRS’s measurement principle and permit acquirers a free choice, acquisition by acquisition, to measure any non‑controlling interest in an acquiree as the non‑controlling interest’s proportionate share of the acquiree’s identifiable net assets, rather than at fair value (paragraph 19 of the IFRS).
